resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit
Face detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage.
Click on "Send Data" to send data
Please check your internet connection! Try again
Selecting "Start Trip Journey", will allow to track the bus from Departure time to Arrival time. This process is repeated on your journey back to school.
Selecting "End Trip Journey" will stop gps tracking of the bus.
Its advisable to leave this screen on until you arrive at your destination.
Please check the notification sent to you…after tapping on Start Trip Journey
Symbolically abused Mr. Newton the Headteacher Primary section on 26th October 2018 while the said teacher was addressing closing assembly.
The misbehaviour should attract expulsion as the Student had been pardoned on various indiscipline cases before.
I need help on how to apply for leave.
I need help on how to mark the class attendance.
I need help on how to record fuel consumption when fueling the vehicle at the Petrol Station.
I need help on how to enquire academic performance history of a specific student.
I need help on how to view disciplinary cases of a specific student.
I need help on how to view attendance history of a specific student.
I need help on how to record servicing details of the school vehicle.
I need help on how to capture the barcode from the pupils/students card on Daily transport
I need help on how to activate the MziziApp to track the bus on a School trip.
I need help on how to record student/pupil indiscipline case.
I need help on how to view the Duty Roster.
On the staff section, tap on the \"Duty Roster\" where you will get the details of the staff member who\'s on duty.
Tap on the highlighted section in blue, to make a call to the number displayed.
On the fleet section, tap on the "Fuel Consumption" which leads to the fuel consumption page
Specify the \"Quantity(litres)\", \"Mileage at fueling\", \"Price per litre\", and Pick the date the vehicle was fueled.
After all fields are filled, tap the save button to save your records.Incase of any errors follow the instructions in red or repeat the steps.
Please check if the record was saved successfully. In case of an error repeat the previous steps.
On the Student section, tap on the \"Disciplanary Case\".
Select the class stream to filter the students according to class, in order to select a student and record an indiscipline case.
Specify the offence and penalty of the disciplinary action for the selected student.
Then tap on the save button, to record the disciplinary action taken for the student.
Please check if the operation was a success, and if not please follow the instruction in red or repeat the previous steps.
On your Mzizi App Home screen, tap on \"Mark Class Attendance\".Here you can mark, as a Teacher Staff, the classes you are assigned to teach.
You just need to select a class session and class stream from the drop downs highlighted in blue above. (You will need to select session then class stream.)

then you will have all the students in that class displayed as a list. You can scroll up and down. The class stream drop down list, specifies the classes you teach. Within the list, you will notice all students\' attendance status is marked \"Present\". At this point, you can save the Attendance register if and only if all students are present.
You can use the highlighted icons to maximize or minimize the student display list.
If not all students are present, mark those absent as absent, and with a reason (if you know of any).
If at the moment you dont have a reason, why this student did not attend class, you are instructed, (the text in red), to hold down the \"Save \" Button to save.

If you tap at the \"Save Button\" the highlighted area will show you the student you have not specified reason for. If you tap the save button again it will show the second student without reason for absence. This will be repeated until all students specified absent have reason and then you can save.(By just tapping on the save button.)

This records are only sent to your school servers or cloud only when you have access to the internet.(make sure you have access to the internet either via WiFi /data bundles) Make sure that you make any changes to the class register before connecting to the internet. The highlighted above, shows the classes you just marked their class registers. You can tap to make any changes.
Check if the records were saved successfully or an error occurred when saving the \"new attendance register\" or \"updating attendance register\".
On the student section, tap on \"Student Enquiry\".
Select the Class Stream and Student Name from the dropdowns highlighted in blue.
You can tap on the actions below, based on what you want to enquire about the student you selected.
Please wait until the Year dropdown loading is complete, found in the next step
Select the year from the dropdown. This automatically enables you to select the term.
Wait for loading to be complete, found in the next step
After loading is complete, you will have the student\'s attendance records displayed as a grid.
You can tap on any grid item, marked present or absent as shown the key above.The dialog highlighted in blue above is displayed.
On the student section, tap on \"Student Enquiry\".
Select the Class Stream and Student Name from the dropdowns highlighted in blue.
You can tap on the actions below, based on what you want to enquire about the student you selected.
Please wait until the Year dropdown loading is complete, found in the next step
Select the year from the dropdown. This automatically enables you to select the term.
Please wait for loading to be complete, found in the next step
After loading is complete, you will have the student\'s disciplinary cases displayed as a list.
On the student section, tap on \"Student Enquiry\".
Select the Class Stream and Student Name from the dropdowns highlighted in blue.
You can tap on the actions below, based on what you want to enquire about the student you selected.
Please wait for loading to be complete. After loading is complete,results of a particular year are displayed.
select the year you want to view results for, from the \"Display results of year:\" dropdown.
On the fleet section tap on \"School Transport\". This takes you to the fleet location page.
Here you are required to select an action, either \"Daily Transport\" or \"Trip Transport\".
Tap on \"Daily Transport\". The app will prompt you to grant it several permissions, all for the purpose of finding your GPS location and scanning barcodes. Tap on \"allow\" on all requests.
Then you are prompted to enable devices Location from your settings on your phone.
While enabling GPS location on, Tap on \"Mode\", and select \"High accuracy\" to get GPS location fast and accurate.
Your device will start searching for GPS signal as inidicated above, \"Searching GPS Signal…\".
Select the vehicle plate number for the route you are using. This vehicle plate will be remembered after every scan, but you can change accordingly.

You are then supposed to scan the barcode which is located in the student ID. The results of the scan show you the necessary information make will help you in deciding whether the student will board the bus, or whether the student uses the route specified and whether the student is morning picked or evening picked.

This records are only sent to your school servers or cloud only when you have access to the internet.(make sure you have access to the internet either via WiFi /data bundles) Make sure that you make any changes to the class register before connecting to the internet.
On the fleet section tap on the \"School Transport\". It takes you to the fleet location page.
Here you are required to select an action, either \"Daily Transport\" or \"Trip Transport\".
Tap on the \"Trip Transport\", your first prompted to enable \"GPS\" from your settings on your phone.
While enabling GPS location on, Tap on \"Mode\", and select \"High accuracy\" to get GPS location fast and accurate.
Later the app will prompt you to grant it permissions to access your device location services. Tap on \"allow on all requests\".
After tapping on \"Start Trip Journey\" you will receive a notification.
Here you are prompted to select the vehicle plate number from the \"Select Vehicle\" dropdown. Here you can choose to either \"Start Trip journey\" or \"End Trip Journey\".
On the fleet section, tap on the \"Fleet service\" which leads to the fleet servicing page.
Select the vehicle plate and service type.

Specify the \"Mileage at service\", "\Next service mileage\", \"Service cost\" and Pick the date the vehicle is serviced, later specify the service report (this is the status of the vehicle after servicing.)
After all fields are filled, tap on the save button to save your record.
Incase of an error, repeat the previous steps again.
Note if the record was successfully saved or an error occurred. Incase of any errors repeat the previous steps.
On the staff section, tap on the \"Apply Leave\".
Make sure you have access to the internet either via WIFI/ Data Bundles. If not, then the screen above shall appear. Tap on \"Try Again\" when you get access to the internet.
Please do wait until your leave entitlement details are loaded. Found in the next step.
After loading is complete, your leave entitlements are displayed hence you can decide on your \"leave days\" options.
Select the \"Leave type\" and \"Delegate To\" from the drop downs highlighted in blue. On \"Delegate To\" dropdown,you select the staff member you want to delegate duties to.
Specify the delegate\'s \"Contact Name\", \"Contact Phone\", \"Contact Email\" and select \"Contact Relation\" on the drop down.
Specify the days applied. Pick a \"Date From\". \"Date To\" will be filled automatically. After all fields are filled correctly, tap on the apply button to apply for leave and wait for confirmation.
Note if the leave application is successful or an error occurred. Incase of any errors repeat the previous steps.
If you get the above error, please wait until your previous request is done being processed.
There are no email clients installed.
There\'s an error during send the msg, please try again later.
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industrys standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
Note: Use the reset button below or restart the app to clear all settings.

This example uses the Google in-app review instead of the library dialog. Debug is enabled. (note: this example doesn\'t work at the moment because the example app hasn\'t been uploaded to the Google Play Store)
This example has no customizations. Debug is enabled.
In this example the default icon (app icon) has been replaced with a cusom icon. Debug is enabled.
This example uses a configured mail feedback dialog. Rate below the threshold to check it out.Debug is enabled.
This example uses the custom feedback dialog instead of the mail feedback dialog. Debug is enabled.
In this example the show never button will be displayed. Debug is enabled.
In this example the show never button will be displayed after three times. This means you have to click the later button for at least 3 times (other examples included). Debug is enabled.

In this example debug is disabled. The dialog will show on the third click. If the \"Later\" button has been clicked, the dialog will show again after 5 more clicks. You can also use the \"Never\" button. \nAttention: If you have already clicked the never button or the feedback button of another example, this dialog will not show up until you click \"reset\" or restart the app.
In this example the rating threshold was set to 4.5. So you need to rate at least 4.5 stars to see the store rating dialog. Debug is enabled.
In this example full star rating is enabled. So you can\'t set half stars in the rating dialog. Debug is enabled.
In this example the default texts has been replaced with dummy texts. Debug is enabled.
In this example the dialog is cancelable. A dialogCancelListener was set to show a toast. Debug is enabled.
This is an additional message, which is hidden by default.
The answer to life, the universe and everything is 42.
I am so blue I\'m greener than purple.
All settings got cleared. Have fun!
